welcome_message_body: Welcome to Xigujing, China! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of this charming city, known for its beautiful traditional architecture and vibrant local markets. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Xigujing has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or a code from a staff member.
